divs: Sighting DetailsWe were cleaning the house, and Taryn looked outside and saw a bright light inthe sky. The bright light grabbed Taryns attention. A UFO. We were fearful,went outside to look @ it, and involentarily ran inside, and brought the dogwith us, and we hid in the kitchen. The object from where we stood looked thesize of a baseball, with little streaks emitting from it. It was moving slowlynorthwest. We ran inside, and immediately went on this website.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wauconda
There were no other sightings in Wauconda on or around October 5th 2002
